column4: In general, does Ati or Nvidia have better support in Ubuntu? I'm thinking of buying a laptop.
but some newer nvidia devices have been problematic w/ Ubuntu.

no.. because to many knuckleheads come here saying "i'm very computer literate".. when in reality they are "windows literate"... the two OS's are almost completely different.. knowing and understanding one, doesn't mean you know and understand the other.
